rows.label: qst640101_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh, absolutely. I've heard
something a Driver would
definitely find real interesting.

rows.label: qst640101_msg0002
rows.name:
It's a rumor about a Divine Beast ship,
packed to the rafters with boosters,
that sank on its way to Acedia.

rows.label: qst640101_msg0003
rows.name:
It was a long time ago, but I hear
its final resting place is not too
far from Gula's Lasqam Island.

rows.label: qst640101_msg0004
rows.name:
Any salvager worth their salt should
be able to get to the boosters
without too much trouble, but...

rows.label: qst640101_msg0005
rows.name:
You might not know that salvaging
boosters requires special tools.

rows.label: qst640101_msg0006
rows.name:
There's a Nopon in the backstreets
of this here town who knows about
these things. Goes by Sisoso.

rows.label: qst640101_msg0007
rows.name:
Ah, don't mention it. I don't have
the aptitude to be a Driver, so I
don't mind sharing that info with you.

rows.label: qst640101_msg0008
rows.name:
If I was a Driver myself, well,
that'd be a whole different story.
